column3: Fibubb Gah requests your assistance in testing a new remedy.

Fibubb Gah has entrusted you with the Brotherhood of Ash's lastest weapon in their kin war─a possible remedy for the madness of the tempered. Subdue the tempered found at the tempering ground in northern Zanr'ak, and test the efficacy of the canticle ash.
You have tested the canticle ash on the tempered with uncertain results. Return to the Ring of Ash and report to Fibubb Gah.

Though disappointed at the remedy's apparent failure, Fibubb Gah vows to continue their efforts into creating a cure for the tempered. He muses that perhaps you just might be the one who tests the first successful batch.
Head to the tempering ground in northen Zanr'ak, and use the canticle ash on subdued tempered.
Honored ally, the Brotherhood of Ash has toiled to create a new weapon to use against our enemies─a phylactery of bone ash, imbued with spirit energy by the sacred chants of our mystics.
It is our hope that the purifying properties of the ash will serve to cleanse the tempered of Ifrit's malign influence. This remedy has, however, yet to be tested.

It is with bitter fortune, then, that we learned of a raid to the south. It seems that a hunting party from Forgotten Springs was ambushed by a superior force, and dragged before the Lord of the Inferno for tempering.
I ask that you locate these unfortunate Miqo'te, and sprinkle upon each a pinch of the ash.
Be sure to pacify the rangers sufficiently first, otherwise our unwilling subjects will simply shake off the ash before it has time to take effect.
Find the tempered Miqo'te, and sprinkle a pinch of canticle ash upon each one to determine the remedy's efficacy. Do not forget to subdue your opponents thoroughly before attempting to use the ash!
Lord Ifrit! Your servant needs You!
So...it seems the canticle ash failed to have the desired effect. Our mystics will be most disappointed.

But the Brotherhood of Ash does not buckle at the slightest sign of hardship! We shall learn from this failure, and redouble our efforts to concoct a cure. You may yet be the first to reclaim a tempered mind from the abyss of madness.
